articles.description: Just days after Maryland became the first state in the country to impose a tax on digital advertising targeting Big Tech, lobbying groups representing companies including Amazon, Facebook, Google are trying to stop it.

articles.title: See Ted Cruz return to Texas following backlash
articles.description: Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) has returned to Houston following backlash over his family trip to Cancún, Mexico, during his home state's deadly winter storm crisis. Houston Police Chief Art Acevedo reacts.

articles.author: Barbara Starr and Oren Liebermann, CNN
articles.title: US signals it is open to sending more troops to Iraq
articles.description: The Pentagon opened the door to the possibility of sending more American troops to Iraq as part of a newly expanded NATO training mission to support Iraqi forces and ensure that ISIS does not rise again.

articles.title: Nikki Haley learns there's no halfway with Trump
articles.description: Nikki Haley's theory of the case when if she runs for president in 2024 is pretty simple: I'm the parts of Donald Trump you liked without any of the parts you didn't like!
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!

articles.description: The FDA, CDC and USDA say the chances of getting the Covid-19 virus from foods and related packaging are "extremely low."

articles.description: As millions of Texans are still without water, heat and power, residents continue to struggle in the aftermath of winter storms. CNN's Camila Bernal reports.

articles.title: Beijing faces new abuse claims from Xinjiang
articles.description: A former teacher and ex-detainee alleges gang rape and torture of women inside China's vast network of detention camps. CNN's Ivan Watson reports.

articles.author: Andrew Kaczynski and Em Steck, CNN
articles.title: Ted Cruz has repeatedly slammed politicians for vacationing during crisis
articles.description: Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, who is facing backlash for traveling to Mexico as a winter disaster ravages his home state, has repeatedly criticized politicians who vacationed or took part in leisure activities during times of crisis, a CNN KFile review finds.

articles.title: NASA's Perseverance rover successfully lands on Mars - CNN Video
articles.description: NASA's Perseverance rover has safely landed on Mars after its 292.5 million-mile journey from Earth, the agency confirmed. CNN's Brooke Baldwin discusses the mission's significance with retired NASA astronaut Col. Ron Garan.

articles.title: Cold weather is chilling vaccine distribution progress
articles.description: The progress made in the effort to get more coronavirus vaccine injections into arms has been derailed by severe weather across the country. CNN's Alexandra Field reports that vaccine supplies are running dry from New York all the way to Idaho.
